title: Am i the only one who hates to win a game like this..?
body: I'm talking about, literally, getting carried. If i play a game badly, let's say i'm 0/5/0, and i win the game because my top laner stomped on enemy top and now he's doing 1v5, to me that's worst than a loss. I'd rather lose a game where i played good, like today i lost a game where i was 4/1/13 Lulu supp because my top and mid fed their as* off in lane, but i wasn't salty. I did my job and i did it good, that's all it matters to me.
